vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.2;
son of: Abraham (H0085) and Keturah (H6989);
half-brother of: Ishmael (H3458) and Isaac (H3327);
brother of: Zimran (H2175), Jokshan (H3370), Midian (H4080), Ishbak (H3435) and Shuah (H7744); also called Mede frequently
Aramaic of me.dan (מְדָן "Medan" H4091)
§ Medes = "middle land"
n pr m
1) the territory inhabited by the Medes
2a) located northwest of Persia proper, south and southwest of the Caspian Sea, east of Armenia and Assyria, and west and northwest of the great salt desert of Iram
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jafet; ancestro de los medos
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米底亞(瑪代) 这个字在原文的意思是 "中部之地"
陽性專有名詞 種族名稱
1) 米底亞的居民
專有名詞 地名
2) 米底亞人所居住的領土
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米底亚(玛代) 这个字在原文的意思是 "中部之地"
阳性专有名词 种族名称
1) 米底亚的居民
专有名词 地名
2) 米底亚人所居住的领土

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Aramaic of ma.day (מָדַי "Media" H4074H)
§ Medes = "middle land"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the territory inhabited by the Medes
2a) located northwest of Persia proper, south and southwest of the Caspian Sea, east of Armenia and Assyria, and west and northwest of the great salt desert of Iram
